instanceType.title: Instance Type
instanceType.description: The type of instance (e.g., t3.micro, t3.small)

state.title: State
state.description: The current state of the instance

publicIpAddress.title: Public IP Address
publicIpAddress.description: The public IP address assigned to the instance

privateIpAddress.title: Private IP Address
privateIpAddress.description: The private IP address assigned to the instance

instanceArn.title: Instance ARN
instanceArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the instance

imageId.title: AMI ID
imageId.description: The ID of the AMI used to launch the instance

launchTime.title: Launch Time
launchTime.description: The time the instance was launched

availabilityZone.title: Availability Zone
availabilityZone.description: The Availability Zone of the instance

vpcId.title: VPC ID
vpcId.description: The ID of the VPC in which the instance is running

subnetId.title: Subnet ID
subnetId.description: The ID of the subnet in which the instance is running

securityGroups.title: Security Groups
securityGroups.description: The security groups for the instance

keyName.title: Key Pair Name
keyName.description: The name of the key pair used when the instance was launched

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: The architecture of the instance (i386 | x86_64 | arm64)

hypervisor.title: Hypervisor
hypervisor.description: The hypervisor type of the instance (ovm | xen)

virtualizationType.title: Virtualization Type
virtualizationType.description: The virtualization type of the instance (hvm | paravirtual)

ebsOptimized.title: EBS Optimized
ebsOptimized.description: Indicates whether the instance is optimized for Amazon EBS I/O

monitoring.title: Monitoring State
monitoring.description: The monitoring state for the instance (enabled | disabled)
